name: Deep Abyss (TaranisElsu, Zypo)
description:
Deep Abyss

Developed for LDJam 48: Deeper and deeper

Find the treasure in the depths of the abyss, but watch out for the things that lurk there.

Controls

  • Move: WASD/Arrow Keys
  • Burst Speed: Spacebar

Developers

  • Zypo: Art + Sound + Programming
  • Taranis Elsu: Programming

Tools

  • Godot - game engine
  • Blender - 3d models
